articles.title: Kim Jong Un Elected Delegate of Seventh Congress of WPK
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Elected Delegate of Seventh Congress of WPK
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A conference of the Korean People's Army (KPA) of the Workers' Party of Korea took place on April 12 and 13.
					 It was attended by delegates elected by the party organizations of units at all levels of the KPA.
					
					 All the participants observed a moment's silence in memory of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The conference reviewed the work done by the Party Committee of the KPA.
					
					 A reporter recalled that since the Sixth Congress of the WPK the KPA has grown to be the army of the leader and the party faithfully carrying forward the bloodline of Paektu under the outstanding and seasoned leadership of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Speakers unanimously stressed that the KPA is demonstrating its might as an elite powerful revolutionary army thanks to the immortal Songun revolutionary leadership exploits of the great leaders and the supreme commander, referring to the successes and experience gained in the past work. 
					
					 There was an election of the leadership body of the Party Committee of the KPA at the conference.
					
					 It elected delegates and nominated observers to the Seventh Congress of the WPK. 
					
					 Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, made a speech on electing supreme leader Kim Jong Un as delegate to the Seventh Congress of the WPK.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's election as delegate to the congress is an expression of absolute trust and intense loyalty by all party members and service personnel of the KPA.
					
					 He proposed electing as delegate to the Seventh Congress of the WPK Kim Jong Un, the great leader of the revolutionary cause of Juche and symbol of mightiness and dignity of the great Paektusan nation, reflecting the unanimous will and desire of all participants in the conference and service personnel.
					
					 Speakers fully supported the proposal to elect Kim Jong Un as delegate to the congress.
					
					 A decision to elect Kim Jong Un as delegate to the congress was adopted with a unanimous approval.
					
					 Officers and service personnel who have devoted themselves to battle preparations and to the work for bolstering up the combat capability of the KPA were elected and nominated as delegates and observers to the congress.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Educational Aid Fund and Stipends to Children of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Educational Aid Fund and Stipends to Children of Koreans in Japan
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent educational aid fund and stipends amounting to 218. 8 million yen to the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan for the democratic national education of children of Koreans in Japan on the occasion of the 104th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The educational aid fund and stipends sent by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un in 162 installments total 47,787,990,390 yen.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Congratulates Syrian President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Congratulates Syrian President
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, sent a congratulatory message to Bashar Al-Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on Thursday.
					 The message said:
					
					 I extend warm congratulations to you and the government and people of your friendly country on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the independence of Syria.
					
					 Over the past 70 years since independence the Syrian Arab people have firmly defended the sovereignty and dignity of the country from the moves of the imperialists for aggression and intervention and are now registering big successes in the struggle to meet all challenges of the hostile forces and achieve the security, stability and territorial integrity of the country under your correct leadership.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I sincerely wish you good health and bigger successes in your responsible work, reaffirming my firm support and solidarity for the just cause of the Syrian Arab people.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks 104th Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 104th Birth Anniversary of Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Thursday to celebrate the 104th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju and other leading officials of the party, state and army, the chairperson of a friendly party, members of the party central leadership organ in Pyongyang, officials of the party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of institutions and industrial establishments in the city, those related to revolutionary activities of the great leaders, those who had the honor of being received by the great leaders, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, working people, overseas Koreans' delegations, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Present there on invitation were foreign diplomatic envoys, representatives of international organizations and military attaches of foreign embassies here and foreign guests.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 The reporter said that April 15 when President Kim Il Sung was born is the most significant and greatest auspicious day for the party, the country and the people and a revolutionary holiday common to mankind which will shine forever with the century.
					
					 Kim Il Sung was the most prominent leader and peerlessly great man who is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people and other progressive people of the world, the reporter noted, referring to the exploits performed by him on behalf of the country and its people, times and history.
					
					 The reporter went on to say:
					
					 From the very day he started the revolution he clarified the revolutionary principle that a revolution should be made independently and creatively by believing in the strength of the people and relying on them and the independence and sovereignty of the nation and the victory of the revolutionary cause are guaranteed by arms of revolution, thereby founding the immortal Juche idea, Songun idea.
					
					 He made an overall clarification of the theoretical and practical issues arising at every stage of revolution and construction and in all their fields, exploring new areas in the development of revolutionary idea and enriching the ideological and moral treasure house of mankind.
					
					 After the liberation of Korea he founded the party, state and army on the basis of the experience and traditions established during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					
					 It was thanks to his Songun leadership that the servicepersons and people of the DPRK defeated the most ferocious enemies, U.S. and Japanese imperialists, and emerged the permanent masters of their destiny and won successive victories in the protracted fierce confrontation with the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 He laid down an original line of socialist construction and led the two-stage social revolution and socialist construction to victory, freeing the Korean people from exploitation and oppression for good and building a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence. 
					
					 He perfectly settled the issue of succession to the revolution fundamental to carrying forward the revolutionary cause.
					
					 Thanks to his advancement of the three charters for national reunification, a firm foundation was laid for the Korean people in the north, the south and abroad to form a powerful driving force for the national reunification and terminate foreign interference by the concerted efforts of the nation and bring earlier the independent reunification of the country.
					
					 He conducted energetic external activities, making an immortal contribution to the development of the world socialist movement, victory in the cause of independence against imperialism, the establishment of independent and fair international relations and global peace and security.
					
					 The reporter stressed the need to hold the great leaders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the sun of Juche for all ages and successfully carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche generation after generation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK will frustrate all sorts of challenges and moves of the anti-reunification forces inside and outside Korea and build a highly dignified prosperous reunified powerful country on this land under the banner of By Our Nation Itself, true to the noble patriotic will and behests of the great leaders, the reporter said, adding:
					
					 The DPRK will boost its foreign relations in the idea of independence, peace and friendship, protect the peace and stability in Asia and other parts of the world as a responsible nuclear weapons state and positively promote the cause of global independence.
					
					 Similar meetings took place in provinces, cities, counties and complexes that day.

articles.title: Greetings to Syrian PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Syrian PM
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju on Thursday sent a message of greeting to Wael Nader Al Halqi, prime minister of Syria, on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of its independence.
					 Expressing belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger, the message wished the government and people of Syria greater successes in their struggle to defend the security of the country and achieve economic development.
					
					 Meanwhile, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a similar message to Walid Al-Muallem, deputy prime minister and minister of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates of Syria.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket and congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 The floral basket and congratulatory letter were conveyed to Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Military, Naval and Air Attache of the Chinese embassy here Zhang Ping who is doyen of the military attaches corps on Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from National Chairman of People's Progressive Party of Nigeria
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from National Chairman of People's Progressive Party of Nigeria
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Damian Ogbonna, national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria, on Thursday on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).

articles.title: Floral Baskets, Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Foreigners
articles.content:
Floral Baskets, Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Foreigners
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received floral baskets from the secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and his party and a delegation of the Japanese National Liaison Council of Societies for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on a visit to the DPRK to celebrate the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung). 
					 Kim Jong Un also received gifts from the secretary General of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and a delegation of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand.
					
					 Floral baskets and gifts were separately conveyed to an official concerned on Thursday.
					
					 Meanwhile, a gift to Kim Jong Un in joint name of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea was conveyed on the same day.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Sent to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Sent to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were sent to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill from the New Communist Party of Britain, the Executive Committee of the African Party for the Solidarity and Justice of Mali, the Women's International Democratic Federation, the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, Kim Il Sung Class of Beijing Middle School No. 5, China, Marcia de Campos Pereira, president of the Women's International Democratic Federation, and Jong Il Sim, widow of DPRK Hero An Tong Su, on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung).
					 The floral baskets were laid before the statues of the great leaders on Thursday.

articles.title: Italian Businessman Arrives
articles.content:
Italian Businessman Arrives
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Giancarlo Elia Valori, chairman of the Italian General Investment Group, arrived here Thursday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Participants in Art Festival Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Participants in Art Festival Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The participants of the 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Thursday.
					 At the time-honored old home in Mangyongdae the guests looked round the relics persevered there with much care, being briefed on the story about the low-roofed thatched home.
					
					 They also toured the National Gifts Exhibition House on the same day.

articles.title: Participants in Art Festival Feted
articles.content:
Participants in Art Festival Feted
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK gave a reception for foreign artistes and overseas Korean artistes taking part in the 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present at the reception were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the SPA, Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, Minister of Culture Pak Chun Nam, members of the organizing committee of the festival and officials concerned.

articles.title: Group and Separate Performances of Art Festival Held
articles.content:
Group and Separate Performances of Art Festival Held
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Group and separate performances of the 30th April Spring Friendship Art Festival took place at theaters here on Thursday.
					 The performances showed ardent reverence of people for Marshal Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche and Songun of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who made great contribution to accomplishing the cause of global independence and developing friendly relations among countries.
					
					 Put on the stages were colorful numbers reflecting the boundless reverence and feelings of yearning for the great men. They showed the will of foreign and overseas Korean artistes to turn the art festival praising the sun into the large flower garden of mankind art.
					
					 The participants in the festival put on the stages piano concerto "Juche" with gem-like poetic language and beautiful melodies in praise of the President who provided the guiding idea in the era of independence with his energetic ideological and theoretical activities. 
					
					 The artistes impressively represented with their rich voice, refined rendition and ensemble the desire and aspiration of the people to enjoy an independent and creative life to their heart's content and live happily in a new world free from war and subordination in the idea of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 Put on the stages were such colorful numbers as songs, dances and instrumental music reflecting the patriotism of the peoples of different countries and their traditional way of life.
					
					 Acrobats put on the stages various works reflecting the human being's inexhaustible creative power, wisdom, bravery and boldness, optimism and spirit.
					
					 The performances go on.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Visit Kimilsungia Festival Venue
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Visit Kimilsungia Festival Venue
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of culture and friendly relations of foreign embassies here toured the venue of the 18th Kimilsungia Festival Thursday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 4th anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the party and state.
					 They looked round immortal flowers in full bloom thanks to the ardent loyalty and sincerity of the army and people of the DPRK and progressive mankind.
					
					 At the end of the visit the guests made entries in the visitor's book.
					
					 And they visited the Sci-Tech Complex on April 12.

articles.title: Baby Homes, Orphanages Inaugurated in Kanggye, Phyongsong, Sariwon
articles.content:
Baby Homes, Orphanages Inaugurated in Kanggye, Phyongsong, Sariwon
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Baby homes and orphanages have been built in Jagang, South Phyongan and North Hwanghae provinces.
					They are equipped with all best amenities and environments for nursing and bringing up children, including childcare rooms, education rooms, nature observation rooms, combined amusement rooms, intelligence playing rooms, bathrooms, barber's, treatment rooms and wading pools.
					
					Inaugural ceremonies of the Kanggye, Phyongsong and Sariwon baby homes and orphanages took place on the spots on Wednesday and Thursday.
					
					Present there were officials of the provincial party and power bodies, officials concerned, children of the baby homes and orphanages and their employees and other working people.
					
					At the end of the ceremonies the participants went round the newly built baby homes and orphanages.

articles.title: DPRK Players Prove Successful at 2016 ISU World Development Trophy Figure Skating Tournament
articles.content:
DPRK Players Prove Successful at 2016 ISU World Development Trophy Figure Skating Tournament
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- DPRK players proved successful at the 2016 ISU World Development Trophy Figure Skating Tournament.
					 The tournament held in Poland from April 11 brought together more than 90 men and women players from 23 countries including the DPRK, Spain, Belgium, Argentina and New Zealand. 
					
					 Han Kum Chol placed first at the junior men's individual event, Ro Yong Myong at the A category juvenile men's individual event, Choe Hyang Rim at the A category juvenile women's individual event and Ro Hyang Mi at the B category juvenile women's individual event.

articles.title: President Kim Il Sung, Founder of Socialist Korea
articles.content:
President Kim Il Sung, Founder of Socialist Korea
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Many people visit Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, with the approach of his birthday (April 15), the Day of the Sun.
					 The President remains in the hearts of the Korean people as the benefactor of nation's resurrection and the eternal sun of Juche.
					
					 He embarked on the road of revolution in his teens, founded the Juche idea, the Songun (military-first) idea and waged the anti-Japanese armed struggle of 20-odd years to liberate Korea from Japan's colonial rule on August 15, Juche 34 (1945).
					
					 Then he founded the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on September 9, 1948, thus making the Korean people the master of the state and society.
					
					 He also led the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War to victory to defend the country's sovereignty and the nation's dignity from the U.S. imperialists' armed invasion.
					
					 He had wisely guided the revolution and construction in reliance on the popular masses to turn the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 Thanks to his devoted and tireless efforts for the country and the nation, the DPRK could proudly exercise its sovereign right on an international arena and its people could enjoy a worthwhile life and happiness under the socialist system.
					
					 That's why the Korean people have held in high esteem Kim Il Sung as the founder of socialist Korea and the eternal President of the DPRK.
					
					 Now they are working hard to build a thriving nation of Juche, the lifelong desire of the President, under the guidance of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Peerlessly Brilliant Commander
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Peerlessly Brilliant Commander
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's life was a great one of a peerlessly brilliant commander who led the Korean revolution to victory by giving priority to arms.
					 The President, who inherited two pistols from his father, started the Songun (military-first) revolutionary leadership with the foundation of the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army on April 25, Juche 21 (1932).
					
					 During the anti-Japanese war, he created unique strategies and guerrilla tactics to defeat the Japanese imperialists who dreamt of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere", and accomplished the historic cause of national liberation. Typical of them are a tactic of marching a long distance at a step, large-unit circling operation and lure-and-attack tactics.
					
					 In the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War, he set forth superb strategies and tactics like the formation of the second front behind the enemy lines, active positional defense battle, tunnel warfare and aircraft-hunting team, tank-hunting team and sniper team movements to bring about the beginning of a decline for the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Under his leadership, the Korean People's Army worked such world-startling miracles as the victory in the siege of Taejon, shooting down B-29s and torpedoing the heavy cruiser Baltimore during the war.
					
					 After the war, he won only victories in the decades-long confrontation with the U.S. imperialists to creditably defend the destiny of the country and nation.
					
					 Now the DPRK people have won victory after victory in the fierce confrontation with the U.S.-led imperialists under the leadership of Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, demonstrating the dignity and might of Songun Korea.

articles.title: 70th Anniversary of General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea Marked
articles.content:
70th Anniversary of General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea Marked
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea (GFSTK) celebrates the 70th anniversary of its foundation.
					 The GFSTK is a prestigious organization in the DPRK that promotes the development of the nation's science and technology and the work for putting the national economy on a Juche, modern, scientific and IT basis.
					
					 On April 14, Juche 35 (1946), the Industrial Technology Federation of North Korea (ITF) came into being under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 In October 1946, Kim Il Sung saw to it that a conference of scientists and technicians doubling as the First ITF Conference was convened. And he made a historic speech "On Present Tasks of Scientists and Technicians" at the conference and took a step to rename the ITF the General Federation of Industrial Technology.
					
					 The Federation made a great contribution to training talented technicians in the periods of building a new Korea and the postwar rehabilitation and had striven for the country's socialist industrialization, technical revolution and self-supporting economy.
					
					 Under the care of leader Kim Jong Il, it developed into the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea which groups all scientists and technicians in the agricultural and natural science sectors of the country.
					
					 The Federation has sponsored science and technology festival every year, making substantial contributions to the nation's science and technology development through diverse sci-tech activities.
					
					 It guides the April 15 technical innovation shock brigades consisting of tens of thousands of technicians and skilled workers active at many industrial establishments and farms across the country.
					
					 It has an organizational system in provinces, cities and counties, industrial establishments and co-op farms as well as more than 100 sectional associations and academic societies.

articles.title: Doctorate of Socio-Politics Conferred on Followers of Juche Idea
articles.content:
Doctorate of Socio-Politics Conferred on Followers of Juche Idea
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The DPRK doctorate of socio-politics was conferred on the foreign followers of the Juche idea who have positively contributed to disseminating the great Juche idea and Songun idea among world progressives.
					 They are Gennady Kulikov, chairman of the Far Eastern Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia, and   D. Enkhbadralt, member of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development, and Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy.
					
					 An awarding ceremony was held at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The mission of the WFP in the DPRK and a delegation of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Thursday to mark the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of the President).
					 They laid floral baskets before the statues and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Giancarlo Elia Valori, chairman of the Italian General Investment Group, also visited the statues to pay tribute to them on the same day.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Its Moves to Suspend Subsides to Korean Schools
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Its Moves to Suspend Subsides to Korean Schools
Tokyo, April 13 (KNS-KCNA) -- Those concerned of Korean schools in Japan held a press conference in Tokyo on April 12 in protest against the Japanese authorities' base discrimination policy.
					 At the conference a member of the Secretariat of the Korean Human Rights Association in Japan recalled that the Japanese government excluded only Korean schools from the tuition-free program for senior high schools and sent a notice to self-governing bodies across Japan on March 29, revealing its attempt to stop the payment of subsides to Korean schools.
					
					 He demanded the Japanese government immediately lift the unreasonable discriminating step against Korean schools.

articles.title: Collection of Memoirs "Among the People" Vol. 105 Published
articles.content:
Collection of Memoirs "Among the People" Vol. 105 Published
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Collection of Memoirs "Among the People" Vol. 105 was brought out in the DPRK.
					 It contains 20 memoirs telling about the feats and noble popular personality of President Kim Il Sung who devoted his all to the work for the prosperity of the country and its people's happiness, always finding himself among them.
					
					 A memoir says that the President visited Jonsung Revolutionary Site, ascertained historical relics for hours and gave instructions to be carried out to preserve and manage them and educate visitors through them, thus making sure that the history and tradition of the victory won in the war were conveyed generation after generation.
					
					 Another memoir tells about the efforts made by the President to develop coal industry by visiting a coal mine in the northern part far from Pyongyang.
					
					 The book also contains a memoir telling about the President who visited construction site of the Tanchon Smeltery several times to turn it into the nation's leading non-ferrous metal producer.
					
					ã€€There are in the book memoirs dealing with the energetic leadership, noble love for the rising generation and future of the President who made tireless efforts for the prosperity of the country and improvement of people's living standard in the whole period of his great life.
					
					 There is also a memoir telling about the noble popular personality of the President who led a modest and simple life like a common man as he lived in the same house as ordinary people's, wearing a plain dress.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flays Japanese Reactionaries' Discrimination against Korean Children in Japan
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flays Japanese Reactionaries' Discrimination against Korean Children in Japan
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan recently sent self-governing bodies notices demanding "reexamination" of the issue of subsidies to Korean schools.
					 This was, in fact, the revelation of the sinister intention of the Japanese reactionaries to stop subsidies to the Korean schools, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Japanese authorities are responsible for guaranteeing the Koreans in Japan democratic national rights and interests and firmly protecting them.
					
					 In view of international law, the educational rights of other nations should be ensured.
					
					 However, the Japanese reactionaries are staging farces contrary to it.
					
					 This is a wanton violation of human rights as it goes against the trend of the times and mockery of human conscience.
					
					 Far from making sincere apology and reparation to the victims of the forced drafting of Koreans, the Japanese reactionaries are committing more unethical crimes even against their descendants under absurd pretexts. The Japanese reactionaries deserve curse and criticism by mankind.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' issue of subsidies to Korean schools is not a simple matter of education but a political problem.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' act of hurting the feelings of Korean children in Japan reminds people once again of the criminal action of the Japanese imperialists to deprive Koreans of their own spoken and written languages and even their full names in a bid to exterminate the Korean nation.

articles.title: U.S. Can Never Falsify Truth about Nuclear Issue on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Can Never Falsify Truth about Nuclear Issue on Korean Peninsula: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The U.S. hosted the tricky 4th "Nuclear Security Summit" recently. 
					 Before the summit, a Russian medium noted that the "Nuclear Security Summit" obliged to get repentance from the world's biggest criminal state U.S. should not be reduced to an immoral assembly misrepresenting the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula. It said that the matter of the DPRK's warning that it would scorch Washington should be excluded from the agenda of the summit because Americans were to blame for causing it.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Thursday says: This was a right comment. It is long since the U.S. lost the moral qualification to host such an international conference as the "Nuclear Security Summit".
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The U.S. was the first to produce A-bombs and it was the only country in the world that inflicted nuclear disasters upon humankind to earn the ill-fame of the empire of evils.
					
					 For such wicked and shameless nuclear criminal state as the U.S. to host the summit sounds very funny because it is like a cruel man-killer behaving like a judge.
					
					 With no rhetoric can the U.S. falsify the truth about the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is no exaggeration to say that the nuclear issue on the peninsula was spawned by the U.S. from the day its forces landed in south Korea in the guise of "liberator" because it dreamed of dominating the world on the basis of nuclear monopoly,
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear weapons and its measure for bolstering up the nuclear deterrent bring into bolder relief the U.S. true colors as the arch criminal that spawned the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The world people are becoming vocal asserting that the U.S. is to blame for compelling the DPRK to have access to nuclear weapons.
					
					 Much upset by this, Obama is keen to hide nature of the U.S. as a nuclear criminal, while shifting the blame for the escalated tension on the peninsula on to the DPRK, but such rhetoric is, in fact, no longer workable at present.

articles.title: Minju Joson Terms Park Geun Hye Political Prostitute
articles.content:
Minju Joson Terms Park Geun Hye Political Prostitute
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- After the opening of the recent "Nuclear Security Summit" in the U.S. Park Geun Hye of south Korea, vociferating about the nuclear issue in the DPRK, claimed that it was a "provocation and threat" to the international community and begged for "all efforts for sanctions and pressure on the north." Not content with this, she flew to Mexico after the summit to malignantly slander the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons and implored "Central and South American states to play their role" and render "support" to south Korea.
					 Minju Joson Thursday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Her disgusting diplomacy reminds one of a political prostitute satisfying her carnal desire by selling off the dignity of the nation.
					
					 Park is the worst sycophant toward the U.S. as she ceased to be a member of the Korean nation and the traitor to the nation as she sold off the dignity and sovereignty of the nation to outsiders, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 Quite clear is that such evil woman has no future as she turned her back on the nation.
					
					 South Koreans are intensifying the anti-Park Geun Hye, anti-"government" actions, declaring there is no telling about what horrible disaster all Koreans would suffer unless Park who looks so menacing is thrown overboard. 
					
					 People's mindset represents the will of Heaven and those going against the mindset are bound to be punished by it.
					
					 Park had better be aware of her such miserable plight that she may be shot to death any moment the same way her father gunned down, and stop wagging her tongue recklessly.
					
					 Her desperate bid to stifle the fellow countrymen would only precipitate her miserable ruin.

articles.title: U.S. State Secretary Accused of Trying to Shift Blame for Tension on Korean Peninsula onto DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. State Secretary Accused of Trying to Shift Blame for Tension on Korean Peninsula onto DPRK
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Disarmament and Peace Institute of the DPRK Foreign Ministry answered the question raised by KCNA on Thursday in connection with the fact that U.S. State Secretary Kerry again pulled up the DPRK as follows:
					 During the G-7 foreign ministerial meeting held in Hiroshima, Japan, shortly ago, the U.S. State Secretary created the atmosphere of pressure on the DPRK while describing the DPRK's bolstering of nuclear deterrence as "challenge" and "provocation" and went so shameful as to give impression that the U.S. is concerned for worldwide dismantlement of nuclear weapons.
					
					 Far from apologizing to the victims and their departed soul in the world's first region stricken with A-bomb dropped by the U.S., Kerry pulled up the DPRK, a shameful act of concealing the true nature of the U.S. as the world's biggest nuclear criminal state.
					
					 Outwardly, the U.S. is talking about building a "world without nuclear weapons" but, in actuality, it spends a colossal amount of fund for the modernization of the nuclear weapons and stages ceaseless nuclear war exercises. These are a crafty trick to divert international criticism of it to the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is trying to convince the public that the nuclear threats increase worldwide and the situation on the Korean peninsula is rendered tense due to the DPRK but it is no more than a wild act that can never be understood by persons of reason.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear weapons is not a threat but an inevitable option for self-defence to defend the country and the nation from the nuclear disaster that may be caused by the U.S.
					
					 If the DPRK had not opted for their access to the nuclear weapons and not bolstered them up steadily, it would have fallen victim to a nuclear attack by the U.S. more than a hundred times just as Japan.
					
					 This is clearly proven by the nuclear war exercises targeting the DPRK being staged in south Korea as well as the plan for nuclear attack and the moves for deployment of nuclear weapons ceaselessly committed by the U.S. against the DPRK for more than half a century.
					
					 Kerry went impudent as to talk about efforts for worldwide dismantlement of nuclear weapons but had it not been for the existence of the U.S., the nuclear threat would not have been posed to the earth and the issue of building "a world without nuclear weapons" would not have cropped up.
					
					 It is the U.S. which made the nuclear weapons for the first time in the world and it is again the U.S. which dropped A-bombs on mankind and it is also the U.S. which is stepping up the modernization of nuclear weapons after designating sovereign states as targets of a preemptive nuclear attack.
					
					 It is also the U.S. which persists in escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula in a bid to invent a pretext for keeping hegemonic status in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 That the DPRK is getting itself fully ready for nuclear attack to react to the U.S. attack in kind is not only to defend its right to existence but to safeguard the regional and world peace and security from the nuclear threats of the U.S. which is brandishing its nuclear stick at random.
					
					 This time the Japanese prime minister, far from wresting an apology from the U.S., an assailant which inflicted the nuclear disaster on his own nation, chimed in with the U.S. while reading its face. This is a senseless act.
					
					 Japan, the only and the first victim country of nuclear bombs in the world, went so servile to the U.S., assailant country, in the A bomb-stricken region, a clear expression of the poor plight of Japan as a political dwarf who has no other way but to pursue the U.S. line blindly.
					
					 The more desperately the hostile forces escalate the racket for reckless pressure on the DPRK, the more sharply it will whet the nuclear treasured sword for self-defence to stamp out the root cause of nuclear disaster threatening humankind, holding high the banner of the line on simultaneously pushing forward the two fronts.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Denounced by S. Korean Organization
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Denounced by S. Korean Organization
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea on April 12 held a meeting before the U.S. embassy in Seoul to denounce the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 Speakers at the meeting accused the U.S. of talking about "dialogue" while ratcheting up sanctions and pressure on the north.
					
					 They claimed that nothing could be solved with the above-said methods.
					
					 They said that such acts of threatening peace on the Korean peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia should be stopped at once, accusing the U.S. of openly pressurizing the Park Geun Hye regime to conclude an agreement on protecting military intelligence with Japan.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- There took place Korean photo and book exhibitions and film shows in Russia, Romania, Germany and Algeria from March 22 to April 4 to observe the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.)
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos showing exploits of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Their works, and books and photos introducing the DPRK were also on show.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Always in Hearts of Mankind" and "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un."
					
					 Revedev, chief of the Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK, highly praised Kim Il Sung for defeating the Japanese imperialists, liberating Korea and humbling the U.S. imperialist aggressors in the 3 year-long Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the New Socialist Party of Romania, said the exhibition would offer an opportunity to Romanian people to get to know better about the personality of Kim Il Sung as the great man.
					
					 The director of the MS Travel Company of Germany and other personages praised Kim Il Sung for dedicating himself to the country and its people and the cause of global independence all his life, adding he will always be remembered by mankind.

articles.title: Day of Sun Observed by Organs of German, British Political Parties
articles.content:
Day of Sun Observed by Organs of German, British Political Parties
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Organs of German and British political parties carried special write-ups to observe the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 The April issue of Rote Fahne, the organ of the German Communist Party, carried an article titled "Model internationalist" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The article gave an account of the fact that in 1949 Stalin, the then leader of the party and people of the Soviet Union, praised Kim Il Sung as a genuine proletarian internationalist who devotedly defended the Soviet Union with arms from the imperialist aggression in the East.
					
					 Kim Il Sung, despite the difficult situation where there were neither support from a regular army nor state-backing home front during the anti-Japanese armed struggle, defended the Soviet Union with arms, sincerely helped the Chinese revolution and gave material and moral support to peoples of various countries in their struggle to put an end to the imperialists' domination and intervention and to achieve national liberation, the article noted, adding:
					
					 20 odd years have passed since his demise but he is always remembered by world progressives as a model of genuine internationalists.
					
					 The April 1st issue of The New Worker, the organ of the New Communist Party of Britain, allotted its two full pages to special write-ups illustrated with his photos.
					
					 It said that he performed matchlessly great exploits for global independence.

articles.title: Foreign Media Observe Day of Sun
articles.content:
Foreign Media Observe Day of Sun
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Foreign media praised President Kim Il Sung's exploits on his birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun).
					 An article titled "On the occasion of the 104th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung" the Syrian newspaper Nidal Al-Palyahin on April 6 said that he was a great man who founded the Juche idea and indicated the way for humankind.
					
					 He rendered material aid and moral support to the African countries' national liberation struggle, anti-imperialist struggle and building of a new society out of his broad magnanimity and noble internationalism, it noted, and went on:
					
					 Though he passed away, his idea and cause shine as ever as the sun.
					
					 Daily Industry of Bangladesh on April 5 carried an article titled "Beaming face" illustrated with photos of Kimilsungia, the flower of the sun, the Arch of Triumph and a panoramic view of Pyongyang City.
					
					 The article noted:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung was a prominent statesman and peerlessly great man as he built the DPRK into an invincible socialist country and made tangible contributions to the cause of global independence.
					
					 He was admired by heads of state and prominent figures of many countries irrespective of their political views and religious belief.
					
					 Renaissance Radio of Guinea introduced Kimilsungia in full bloom around the world to praise the great man, twice a day from April 4 to 10.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Syria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Syria
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was published in pamphlet by the Syrian newspaper Al Baath on the occasions of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung) and the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The work, published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and indicates the tasks for successfully accomplishing the cause of the Songun revolution.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the newspaper on April 5.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Slovakia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Slovakia
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was brought out in pamphlet by the Slovak Association for Supporting the Juche Idea on April 1 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 The work, published on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), says the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the immutable truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks to demonstrate the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on April 7 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung).
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the Workers' Party of Korea is a proud course in which it has taken responsible care of the people and led the Korean revolution to victory under the guidance of the President and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also posted on the website was a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kimilsungia Exhibition Held in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kimilsungia Exhibition Held in Indonesia
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- A Kimilsungia exhibition was held in Jakarta, Indonesia from April 7 to 9 on the occasions of the Day of the Sun (the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung), the 51st anniversary of Kim Il Sung's and leader Kim Jong Il's visit to Indonesia and the 51st anniversary of the naming of Kimilsungia.
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition were photos showing the exploits of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were figures and masses of Indonesia.
					
					 Ristiyanto, secretary general of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, said in a speech that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il visited Indonesia 51 years ago, laying a firm foundation for friendship between Indonesia and the DPRK. 
					
					 The exhibition will help the visitors know better about the undying feats Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in developing the friendly relations between the two countries, he noted, adding:
					
					 I am convinced that the exhibition will mark an important occasion in boosting the friendship between the peoples of the two countries.
					
					 The Pioneer Party of Indonesia extends full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to build a thriving nation and reunify the country under the wise leadership of respected HE Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the opening ceremony.

articles.title: British Organizations Praise Kim Jong Un's Exploits
articles.content:
British Organizations Praise Kim Jong Un's Exploits
Pyongyang, April 14 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK on April 5 made public a joint statement in congratulation of the 4th anniversary of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of office as the first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The statement said it was of great political significance in the struggle to develop the party and carry out the revolutionary cause of Juche that Kim Jong Un was elected to the top posts of the WPK and the state by the unanimous will and desire of all the Koreans.
					
					 He has performed undying exploits for the times and history by wisely leading the party, state, army and people, the statement noted.
					
					 It was one of his greatest feats that he brought about auspicious events such as the success in the first H-bomb test and the successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 by setting forth a new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force and energetically leading the work for carrying out the line, the statement added.

articles.title: Efectuado acto central por 104o aniversario de natalicio de Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Efectuado acto central por 104o aniversario de natalicio de Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 14 en el capitalino Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang el acto central por el 104o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					Asistieron Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So, Pak Pong Ju y otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los miembros de los organos directivos centrales del partido en esta capital, funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas, ministerios y organos centrales, oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, cuadros de organismos, fabricas y empresas en esta capital, personas que tienen relaciones con el Presidente o fueron recibidas por el, familiares de los martires revolucionarios, trabajadores, las  delegaciones de los coreanos residentes en otros paises, los compatriotas en ultramar y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los agregados militares, acreditados en Corea y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					El informante enfatizo en que el 15 de abril, dia de nacimiento del Presidente Kim Il Sung, es la maxima fiesta nacional de gran significado para nuestro partido, patria y pueblo y la eterna fiesta revolucionaria comun de la humanidad.
					
					Elogio al Presidente como Lider mas destacado y gran hombre sin igual quien vive para siempre en el corazon del pueblo coreano y de la humanidad progresista y enumero las proezas del Presidente realizadas ante la patria y el pueblo, la epoca y la historia.
					
					En el primer periodo de la revolucion, el Presidente creo la inmortal idea Juche, la de Songun, dilucidando los principios de la revolucion de que la revolucion debe ser realizada de manera independiente y creativa confiando y basandose en la fuerza del pueblo y que las fuerzas armadas de la revolucion garantizan la soberania y la independencia de la nacion y la victoria de la causa revolucionaria.
					
					Al aclarar totalmente los problemas teorico-practicos de todas las etapas y dominios de la revolucion y la construccion, el Presidente abrio el nuevo plano del desarrollo de la idea revolucionaria y desarrollo y enriquecio los bienes ideologicos y espirituales de la humanidad.
					
					Despues de la liberacion de la patria, realizo exitosamente la causa de fundacion del partido, Estado y ejercito a base de las experiencias y tradiciones obtenidas en el fragor de la revolucion antijaponesa.
					
					Gracias a la direccion de Songun del Presidente Kim Il Sung, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea derrotaron los dos imperialismos mas crueles y se hicieron duenos eternos de su destino, asi como lograron sucesivas victorias en la enconada confrontacion de largo plazo con los imperialistas yanquis.
					
					El Presidente presento la original linea por la construccion socialista y dirigio a la victoria las dos etapas de la revolucion social y la construccion socialista, de manera que libero para siempre a nuestro pueblo de la explotacion y opresion y levanto la potencia socialista independiente, autosostenida y autodefensiva.
					
					El Presidente soluciono perfectamente el problema de sucesion, fundamento de la continuacion de la causa revolucionaria.
					
					Al presentar las 3 Cartas para la Reunificacion de la Patria, preparo la firme base para que los coreanos formen el poderoso sujeto por la reunificacion de la patria que puede poner fin con la fuerza unida de la nacion a la intervencion de las fuerzas exteriores y lograr lo mas pronto posible la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Al realizar las energicas actividades exteriores, hizo un inmortal aporte al fortalecimiento y desarrollo del movimiento socialista del mundo, la victoria de la causa de la independencia antiimperialista, el establecimiento de las independientes e imparciales relaciones internacionales y la paz y seguridad del mundo.
					
					El informante exhorto a enaltecer para siempre a los grandes Lideres como Sol del Juche y continuar y llevar a feliz termino de generacion en generacion la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					En acato al noble espiritu de amor al pais y la nacion y el legado de los grandes Lideres, hay que levantar a toda costa la potencia reunificada prospera bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", frustrando todo tipo de desafios y obstrucciones de las fuerzas internas y externas anti-reunificacion, dijo.
					
					Y subrayo que bajo el ideal de la independencia, la paz y la amistad la RPDC ampliara y desarrollara las relaciones exteriores y defendera la paz y la estabilidad de Asia y el mundo como responsable poseedor de armas nucleares, e impulsara activamente la causa por la realizacion de la independencia en el mundo entero.
					
					Por otra parte, fueron realizados el mismo dia las semejantes actividades en todas las provincias, ciudades, distritos y complejos.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Bashar al-Assad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Bashar al-Assad
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 14 un mensaje de felicitacion a Bashar al-Assad, Presidente de la Republica Arabe de Siria.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					En ocasion del 70o aniversario de la independencia de Siria, extiendo las felicitaciones cordiales a Vd., al gobierno y pueblo amistosos de vuestro pais.
					
					Durante los 70 anos despues de la independencia, el pueblo arabe de Siria defendio con firmeza la soberania y la dignidad del pais frente a las maniobras agresivas e intervencionistas de los imperialistas y hoy en dia, bajo la direccion correcta de Vd., logra grandes exitos en la lucha para la seguridad, la estabilidad y la integridad territorial del pais, frustrando todo tipo de desafios de las fuerzas hostiles.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para reafirmar el firme apoyo y solidaridad con la causa justa del pueblo arabe de Siria y formulo votos de todo corazon por su salud y mayores exitos de su trabajo responsable.

articles.title: IDP de MINREX denuncia secretario de Estado de EE.UU.
articles.content:
IDP de MINREX denuncia secretario de Estado de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que el secretario de Estado norteamericano Kerry calumnio de nuevo la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Instituto de Desarme y Paz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 14 la siguiente respuesta a la ACNC: 
					Durante la reunion de cancilleres de 7 paises, efectuada en Hiroshima de Japon, el secretario de Estado norteamericano Kerry infundio un ambiente de presion anti-RPDC calificando de "desafio" y "provocacion" sus esfuerzos por el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear y actuo sin escrupulos como si tuviera algun interes en el desmantelamiento de las armas nucleares en el mundo entero. 
					
					Lejos de pedir perdon a las victimas en la zona damnificada por los primeros desastres de bomba atomica fabricada por EE.UU., Kerry calumnio injustamente a la RPDC con el intento cinico de ocultar la naturaleza de su pais como peor criminal nuclear del mundo.
					
					Todo esto es una artimana astuta de EE.UU. para imputar a la RPDC las criticas internacionales causadas por sus incesantes ejercicios de guerra nuclear que se desarrollan malgastando enormes fondos en la modernizacion de armas nucleares y abogando por el "mundo sin armas nucleares". 
					
					EE.UU. pretende inducir en error la opinion publica como si la RPDC fuera autor del aumento de la amenaza nuclear en la palestra internacional y de la agravacion de la situacion en la Peninsula Coreana, pero nadie lo consentira. 
					
					La posesion de armas nucleares de la RPDC no es una amenaza sino la inevitable opcion para defender el pais y la nacion desde los desastres nucleares de EE.UU. 
					
					Si la RPDC no hubiera poseido las armas nucleares ni fortalecido el disuasivo nuclear, ya habria sufrido por el ataque nuclear de EE.UU. al igual que Japon. 
					
					Lo prueban el intento de ataque nuclear, la ubicacion de pertrechos de guerra nuclear y los freneticos ejercicios de guerra nuclear que EE.UU. libra durante mas de medio siglo en el suelo surcoreano contra la RPDC. 
					
					Kerry hablo cinicamente de sus esfuerzos por el desmantelamiento de armas nucleares en el mundo entero. Pero, si no hubiera existido el imperio americano en nuestro planeta, no habria surgido ni la amenaza nuclear ni el problema de construccion del "mundo sin armas nucleares". 
					
					EE.UU. es el primer pais que fabrico las armas nucleares y unico pais que acarreo los desastres nucleares a la humanidad. Y ahora da acicate a la modernizacion de armas nucleares fijando a algunos Estados soberanos como blancos de ataque preventivo nuclear. 
					
					EE.UU. agrava persistentemente la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana para preparar el pretexto favorable a mantener la posicion hegemonica en la region de Asia-Pacifico.
					
					Hacemos todos los preparativos de ataque nuclear frente a la ofensiva nuclear de EE.UU., lo cual es una medida para defender el derecho a vivir y la paz y seguridad de la region y el resto del mundo desde la amenaza nuclear de este imperio yanqui que blande a su antojo el garrote nuclear.
					
					El premier japones se alio tontamente a EE.UU. observando su actitud, lejos de obtener las disculpas de este imperio que impuso las calamidades nucleares a su nacion. 
					
					Japon, golpeado por las bombas nucleares de EE.UU. por primera vez y unicamente en el mundo, actuo vilmente adulando a EE.UU. en la zona damnificada, lo cual demuestra claramente su situacion miserable como enano politico que se ve obligado a seguir a ciegas a su amo gringo.
					
					Cuanto mas recurran las fuerzas hostiles a la imprudente campana de presion contra nuestro pais, tanto mas fortaleceremos el remedio omnipotente nuclear de autodefensa para extirpar la causa raigal de la calamidad nuclear que amenaza la humanidad, manteniendo la linea del desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares.

articles.title: FGCTC acoge 70o aniversario de su fundacion
articles.content:
FGCTC acoge 70o aniversario de su fundacion
Pyongyang, 14 de abril (ACNC) -- La Federacion General de Ciencia y Tecnica de Corea (FGCTC) acogio el septuagesimo aniversario de su fundacion.
					La federacion es una entidad prestigiosa que impulsa el desarrollo de ciencias y tecnicas del Estado y la jucheanizacion, modernizacion, cientifizacion e informatizacion de la economia nacional.
					
					Despues de la liberacion de Corea del coloniaje japones, el Presidente Kim Il Sung encontro a los cientificos y tecnicos y les hizo participar activamente en la construccion de nueva patria. En este curso se fundo el 14 de abril del 35 (1946) de la Era Juche la Federacion de Tecnologia Industrial del Norte de Corea, origen de la FGCTC.
					
					El Presidente convoco en octubre de 1946 la Conferencia de Cientificos y Tecnicos, abierta por primera vez con motivo del primer congreso de la Federacion de Tecnologia Industrial de Norte de Corea, ocasion en la cual pronuncio el historico discurso "Sobre las tareas actuales de los cientificos y tecnicos" e hizo renombrar la Federacion de Tecnologia Industrial como Federacion General de Tecnologia Industrial.
					
					La federacion hizo gran aporte a la formacion de intelectuales tecnicos en el tiempo de construccion de nueva Corea y el de restauracion posbelica y dinamizo la lucha por realizar la industrializacion socialista, la revolucion tecnica y la independencia economica del pais.
					
					Bajo la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la Federacion de Tecnologia Industrial se desarrollo como la de ahora que implica a todos los cientificos y tecnicos de las ramas de agricultura y ciencias naturales.
					
					La federacion auspicia cada ano el festival de ciencias y tecnicas y libra varias actividades como la presentacion nacional de ciencias y tecnicas de la rama de nano-tecnologia, la presentacion nacional de hipotesis e idea, etc.
					
					Controla las actividades de las Brigadas de Innovacion Tecnica 15 de Abril compuestas por decenas de miles de cientificos y trabajadores calificados de muchas fabricas, empresas y granjas de todo el pais.
					
					Cuenta con el sistema organizativo en las provincias, ciudades y distritos y en las fabricas, empresas y granjas cooperativas e implica mas de 100 asociaciones y sociedades por ramas.
